pullrequest.title: Logging Part 6: Playback ignition transport topics

content.raw:
Notice that the condition is `!=`, which means this function will return here if the publisher already exists, because there is no need to create a new one.

The return value of this function is `true` if a new publisher was created, and `false` if no publisher needed to be created, because one already existed that matches the requested (topic, type) pair.
content.html:
Notice that the condition is !=, which means this function will return here if the publisher already exists, because there is no need to create a new one.

The return value of this function is true if a new publisher was created, and false if no publisher needed to be created, because one already existed that matches the requested (topic, type) pair.
